system.damageOrEffect: Lose Primitive and Accurate Qualities if weapon has them. Gain +1d10 Energy Damage and PEN 6, as well as Melta and Innaccurate Qualities. Bolts weigh 2x as much as regular Crossbow bolts.

description.value:
Damage/Effect: Lose Primitive and Accurate Qualities if weapon has them. Gain +1d10 Energy Damage and PEN 6, as well as Melta and Innaccurate Qualities. Bolts weigh 2x as much as regular Crossbow bolts.

Qualities: Primitive (lose), Accurate (lose) Melta, Innaccurate.
